sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>true</before> <description>Allow one more update for the modified files related to Benchmark KPIs for Assessments.</description> <name>AllowOneMore: Assessment Benchmarks KPIs</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var files = [ 'pa_scripts_efb9db72531403000d620d0323dc3469.xml', ]; for (var i=0; i<files.length; i++) sn_applyonce.ApplyOnce.allowOneMoreUpdate(files[i]); gs.info("Assessment Core Benchmark apply once API called");]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-09-29 19:35:00</sys_created_on> <sys_id>5cae9875c52fd010f87740154d7d6358</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>AllowOneMore: Assessment Benchmarks KPIs</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Benchmark Common" source="sn_bm_common">1bc6c2d3db92220004997878f0b8f571</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Benchmark Common">1bc6c2d3db92220004997878f0b8f571</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_5cae9875c52fd010f87740154d7d6358</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-09-29 19:35:00</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
